languages.text: Необычная маска из красного металла: ее рот искажен в оскале, а губы порваны в подобии клыков.
An unusual mask made of red metal. The mouth is twisted into a scowl, its lips torn in such a way that they resemble fangs.
languages.original_text: Необычная маска из красного металла: ее рот искажен в оскале, а губы порваны в подобии клыков.

traits.locale_text: An unusual mask made of a red metal. Its mouth is twisted in a scowl, and its lips torn in a way that resembles fangs.

languages.text: 赤い金属で作られた、風変わりな仮面。口元は不機嫌そうにゆがみ、裂けた唇はまるで牙のように見える。
languages.original_text: An unusual mask made of red metal. The mouth is twisted into a scowl, its lips torn in such a way that they resemble fangs.

traits.locale_text: 赤い金属で作られた、風変わりな仮面。口元は不機嫌そうにゆがみ、裂けた唇はまるで牙のように見える。

languages.text: Kırmızı metalden yapılmış, alışılmadık bir maske. Ağzı öfkeyle bükülmüş, dudaklarıysa keskin dişleri andırırcasına yırtılmış.
languages.original_text: An unusual mask made of red metal. The mouth is twisted into a scowl, its lips torn in such a way that they resemble fangs.

traits.locale_text: Kırmızı metalden yapılmış, alışılmadık bir maske. Ağzı öfkeyle bükülmüş; dudakları, keskin dişleri andırırcasına yırtılmış.

languages.text: Una máscara peculiar forjada con un metal rojo. La boca está fruncida y sus labios están separados para dar apariencia de colmillos.
languages.original_text: An unusual mask made of red metal. The mouth is twisted into a scowl, its lips torn in such a way that they resemble fangs.

traits.locale_text: Una máscara peculiar forjada con un metal rojo. La boca está fruncida y sus labios están separados para dar apariencia de colmillos.

languages.text: 这个不同寻常的面具由红色金属制成。面具的嘴角扭曲着，看起来满面怒容，嘴唇也四分五裂，仿佛尖牙一般。
languages.original_text: An unusual mask made of red metal. The mouth is twisted into a scowl, its lips torn in such a way that they resemble fangs.

traits.locale_text: 这个不同寻常的面具由红色金属制成。面具的嘴角扭曲着，看起来满面怒容，嘴唇也四分五裂，仿佛尖牙一般。

languages.text: Masque insolite en métal rouge. La bouche est retroussée en une grimace sinistre et les lèvres déchiquetées de telle manière qu'elles ressemblent à des crocs.
languages.original_text: An unusual mask made of red metal. The mouth is twisted into a scowl, its lips torn in such a way that they resemble fangs.

traits.locale_text: Masque insolite en métal rouge. La bouche est retroussée en une grimace sinistre et les lèvres déchiquetées de telle manière qu'elles ressemblent à des crocs.

languages.text: Eine ungewöhnliche Maske aus rotem Metall. Der Mund ist mürrisch verzogen, dich hochgezogenen Lippen geben Reißzähne preis.
languages.original_text: An unusual mask made of red metal. The mouth is twisted into a scowl, its lips torn in such a way that they resemble fangs.

traits.locale_text: Eine ungewöhnliche Maske aus rotem Metall. Der Mund ist mürrisch verzogen, dich hochgezogenen Lippen geben Reißzähne preis.
